SCTX:
Begin DagothTaunt_4

short done

if ( MenuMode == 1 )
	return
endif

if ( done == 1 )
	return
endif

if ( GetStandingPC == 0 )
	return
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex C3_DestroyDagoth >= 50 )
	return
endif

if ( Player->GetItemCount "wraithguard" == 0 )
	;don't play if player doesn't have tools
	return
endif

Player->Say  "vo\misc\Dagoth Ur Taunt 4.mp3" "Welcome, Moon-and-Star. I have prepared a place for you."
set done to 1

End
